alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 7:07PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Jackson Parish through 730 PM CDT... At 707 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jonesboro. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Hodge, North Hodge, East Hodge and Quitman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
